message.content: This question requires understanding of the sources of power for different objects. During a power outage, electrical appliances that rely on electricity, such as an electric fan, fail to work because they are not receiving power. Option (B), a hand pump, does not rely on electricity and can still be used during a power outage. Option (C), a campfire, does not require electricity and can be lit and used for heat and cooking during a power outage. Option (D), a baseball bat, is not dependent on electricity and can still be used for its intended purpose during a power outage.

This question requires basic knowledge about the dependence of certain devices on electricity. During a power outage, when there is no electricity, an electric fan will not work because it requires electricity to operate. Option (B), a hand pump, does not rely on electricity and can still be used during a power outage. Option (C), a campfire, does not require electricity and can still be started and used for warmth or cooking. Option (D), a baseball bat, is not a device that relies on electricity, so it will still work during a power outage.

The correct answer is (A) an electric fan. During a power outage, electrical devices that rely on electricity to function will not work. An electric fan requires electricity to operate, so it will not work during a power outage. Option (B) is incorrect because a hand pump does not require electricity and can still be used to pump water during a power outage. Option (C) is incorrect because a campfire does not require electricity and can be lit and used for light, heat, and cooking during a power outage. Option (D) is incorrect because a baseball bat does not rely on electricity and can still be used during a power outage.

Option (C), a campfire, does not require electricity to start or maintain as it can be fueled by wood or other combustible materials. Option (D), a baseball bat, is not dependent on electricity to work as it is a physical object used in sports and does not require any electrical components.
